description: Parents have taken to Mumnset to reveal the most ridiculous names they've heard, including Toffee, Tiara and a baby girl called Danger, while one woman knows brothers Teddy and Bear.
title: Are these the most ridiculous baby names EVER?
title_page: Are these the most ridiculous baby names EVER? | Daily Mail Online
text:
Choosing a baby name is no easy task, and it's understandable that sometimes parents want a title that will stand out in a sea of traditional names.
However, some can unfortunately take things a step too far, and seemingly without any consideration of the eternal teasing in the playground their child faces, if names like Harry Potter and Tiara are anything to go by.
Mothers have been revealing the most unusual baby names they've ever heard in a Mumsnet discussion, with hilarious results - for everyone except the unfortunate individual who has to put up with the moniker.
The discussion was prompted by user CuppaTeaTeddy, who explained that there was a boy in her school whose middle names were Ryan Giggs, before asking others to share their standout examples.
People told of children called Tinkabell, Marvellous, Danger and Diesel, while some had encountered unfortunate name and surname combinations such as Richard Richards, Dickie Bird and Missy Pitts.
Others recalled old schoolmates or people they've met through work with names like Kevin Slevin, Isla White and Robin Hood.
Mothers have been sharing the most outrageous children's names they've ever heard in a hilarious Mumsnet discussion, including a girl called Tiara (picture posed by model)
Being named Daddy-Cool is certainly a lot for any child to live up to
Not everyone will be best pleased to grow up and fine out they've been given the same name as a creamy liqueur
Naming your child after a celebrity or famous character from a book is a risky strategy
Unfortunate name combinations such as Richard Richard and Richard Head had users in stitches
Some parents don't appear to take their surname into account when thinking of a name for their child
One has to wonder if the parents of these individuals were being intentionally cruel
One woman's son goes to nursery with a fashionably titled child called Dior
Danger is certainly an unusual name for either sex, but is rather an alarming title for a baby girl
One woman's daughter attends school with the evocatively named Opus Dei
It surely can't have escaped the parents of Robin Hod that they were naming their child after the famous outlaw
Tinkabelle understandably got fed up with using her full name
One innovative couple called their daughter Female after her sex was written down by the midwife
One woman reacted with horror when her husband suggested calling their child the same name as a high street retail giant
One football fan paid tribute to his team by naming his daughter Crystal Alice
It's one thing having an unusual name like Bear and quite another to have to put up with a brother called Teddy
